laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The 24-hour UP increased to 3.523 g/day one year later.
Creatinine remained stable initially, then increased over time.
Decreased from 38 g/L to 28 g/L over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: C4 <0.068 g/L and C3 0.530 g/L initially; C4 <0.068 g/L and C3 0.480 g/L in July 2023
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: C3 decreased from 0.530 g/L to 0.480 g/L over time; C4 remained <0.068 g/L.
Increased from 93 g/L to 102 g/L over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial abnormal lymphocytes accounted for approximately 2%; increased to approximately 4.07% in July 2023.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Abnormal lymphocyte percentage increased over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Abnormal small and medium B lymphocytes occupied 3% of nucleated cells initially; decreased to 1.11% in July 2023.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased percentage of abnormal small and medium B lymphocytes over time.
